aws_vpc_peering_connection_options.description: Provides a resource to manage VPC peering connection options.

vpc_peering_connection_id.description: The ID of the requester VPC peering connection.

accepter.description: - An optional configuration block that allows for [VPC Peering Connection]

requester.description: - A optional configuration block that allows for [VPC Peering Connection]

id.description: The ID of the VPC Peering Connection Options.
